Test Case Title: Valid Login with Agree Checkbox
Expected Result: Login page is displayed with email textfield - password textfield - Agree checkbox - Login button

Test Case Title: Valid Login with Agree Checkbox
Step Description: Enter valid email in the email textfield
Expected Result: Email is entered and displayed in the field

Test Case Title: Valid Login with Agree Checkbox
Step Description: Enter valid password in the password textfield
Expected Result: Password is entered and masked (dots/asterisks)

Test Case Title: Valid Login with Agree Checkbox
Expected Result: Checkbox becomes checked/ticked

Test Case Title: Valid Login with Agree Checkbox
Expected Result: Login request is sent to the server

Test Case Title: Valid Login with Agree Checkbox
Expected Result: Dashboard is visible within 15 seconds. URL contains /dashboard

Test Case Title: Verify Dashboard Side Menu and Action Buttons
Precondition: User logged in and Dashboard visible
Step Description: Verify Dashboard page is fully loaded
Expected Result: Dashboard content is visible

Test Case Title: Verify Dashboard Side Menu and Action Buttons
Precondition: User logged in and Dashboard visible
Step Description: Verify side menu is visible on the left with 7 options
Expected Result: Side menu displays: Dashboard (highlighted) - Roles - Applied Roles - Assessment - Interview/Drive - Offer Received - Events

Test Case Title: Verify Dashboard Side Menu and Action Buttons
Precondition: User logged in and Dashboard visible
Step Description: Verify additional action buttons are visible
Expected Result: 'Complete Now' and 'My Resume' buttons are visible on the page

Test Case Title: Navigate to Roles Page via Side Menu
Step Description: Click on 'Roles' from the side menu
Expected Result: Roles page loads successfully. Side menu highlights 'Roles' as active. URL reflects Roles page

Test Case Title: Search for a Role
Step Description: Verify the Role search bar is displayed at the top
Expected Result: Search input field is visible and accepts text input

Test Case Title: Search for a Role
Step Description: Enter the role name in the search bar
Expected Result: Typed text appears in the search field. System filters/searches for matching roles

Test Case Title: Search for a Role
Expected Result: Matching role cards/listings appear. Each card shows role name and relevant details

Test Case Title: Click Check Eligibility
Precondition: Search results visible with desired role
Step Description: Click on 'Check Eligibility' button on the desired role card
Expected Result: Check Eligibility page/modal opens. System evaluates student eligibility status

Test Case Title: View Eligibility Criteria and Navigate to Skills
Step Description: Verify eligibility criteria sections are displayed
Expected Result: Sections visible (Skills - Education - Experience etc.). Each section shows met/not met status

Test Case Title: View Eligibility Criteria and Navigate to Skills
Expected Result: Skills section expands or navigates to Skills page. Mandatory skills for the role are displayed

Test Case Title: View Mandatory Skills and Open Add Skill
Step Description: Verify the Mandatory Skills section is visible
Expected Result: List of required skills shown. Each skill shows fulfilled or pending status

Test Case Title: View Mandatory Skills and Open Add Skill
Expected Result: Add Skill page/modal opens. Two areas displayed: Skill Category Selection (top) and Additional Skill Input Options (bottom)

Test Case Title: Dashboard Load Time After Login
Step Description: Observe time from login to Dashboard visible
Expected Result: Dashboard visible within 15 seconds

Test Case Title: Side Menu Highlight Active Page
Step Description: Click a side menu item and verify highlight
Expected Result: 'Roles' highlighted on Roles page. 'Dashboard' highlighted on Dashboard

Test Case Title: Role Search Filters Results Dynamically
Step Description: Type partial role name in search bar
Expected Result: Search results update dynamically to show matching roles

Test Case Title: Skill Category Expand/Collapse Behavior
Step Description: Click each skill category and verify expand/collapse
Expected Result: Academics shows 2 checkboxes (10th + 12th). Internship - Work Experience - Training Course - Project each show 1 checkbox

Test Case Title: Ant Design Dropdowns Searchable on Add Pages
Precondition: Any Additional Skill Input page open
Step Description: Click an Ant Design dropdown and type partial text
Expected Result: Dropdown filters and shows matching options

Expected Result: Applied Roles page loads. Previously applied role is listed
